zone.line: With men. Go strait on in the Devil's name
Or I shall puff your flickering life out
I. F.
- Well,
I see you are the Master of the house
I will accommodate myself to you.
Only consider, that tonight this mountain
Is all enchanted, & if Jack 'a lantern
Shows you his way, though you should miss your
own,
You ought not to be too exact with him.
(Faust, Mephistopheles & Ignis Fatuus, in
alternate chorus)
The limits of the sphere of dream -
The bounds of true & false are past.
Lead us on, thou wandering Gleam
Lead us onward, far & fast,
To the wide, the desart waste.
But see how swift advance & shift
Trees behind trees, row by row -
How clift by clift, rocks bend & lift
